All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ArgumentParser
This class provides methods to parse command line arguments for the QuestionGenerator.
Article
This class represents an article in the wiki.
CategoriesWikiGetter
This class extends WikiGetter and is responsible for getting categories from a wiki.
Category
This class represents a category in the wiki.
Dictionary
This class extends Wiktionary and provides methods to interact with a dictionary.
JsoupGetter
This class provides methods to retrieve a document from a specified URL using Jsoup.
KeysWikiGetter
This class extends WikiGetter and is responsible for getting keys from a wiki.
PageViewer
This class is responsible for viewing pages.
Question
This class represents a question with its text and sub-questions.
Question.SubQuestion
This class represents a sub-question with its key, values, and the index of the correct answer.
QuestionCollector
This class provides methods to collect and manage questions.
QuestionCreator
This class provides methods to create and manage questions.
QuestionGenerator
This class is responsible for generating questions.
QuestionTextCreator
This class provides methods to create text for questions.
Test_01
This class contains tests for normal questions.
Test_02
This class contains tests for normal questions.
Test_03
This class contains tests for normal questions.
ValueCategory
This class represents a value category in the wiki.
ValuesWikiGetter
This class extends WikiGetter and is responsible for getting values from a wiki.
WikiGetter
This abstract class provides methods for getting information from a wiki.
WikiObject
This abstract class represents a generic object in the wiki.
Wiktionary
This class provides methods to interact with Wiktionary.
Wiktionary.GENUS
This enum represents the genus of a word.
